name: Arkadias-DiscordBot
author: Massimo Pavoni
description: Discord bot utility for Arkadias DnD RPG guild management.
bot_description:
Ciao! Io sono Odoaldo, un personaggio particolarmente benvoluto, e sono qui perché ti è stato concesso il permesso di invitarmi nella tua gilda Discord...ti è stato dato, sì??
Comunque, posso fare un sacco di cose fighe, quindi semplicemente esplorami! Mlml...
command_not_found_description: You might want to check the list of commands with `{0}help`
missing_required_argument_description: You might want to check the syntax of the command with `{0}help {1}`
command_invoke_error_description: You might want to check your command invocation with `{0}help {1}`
generic_error_description: You might want to ask the developer to check the bot logs.
shutdown_message:
See you later adventurers, I'mma rest now :sleeping:

`Arkai is going offline`
shutdown_brief: Close the bot connection, bot owner only
shutdown_description:
The bot owner can use this command to shutdown the application.
Warning: use with caution and make sure that the owner of the bot can fix eventual problems.
get_extensions_brief: Get info on the extensions, admins only
get_extensions_description: Admins can use this command to get basic information on the status of the bot extensions.
load_extensions_brief: Load a set of extensions, bot owner only
load_extensions_description:
The bot owner can use this command to load a specified list of the bot extensions.
Warning: use with caution, if the extensions work without problems.
unload_extensions_brief: Unload a set of extensions, bot owner only
unload_extensions_description:
The bot owner can use this command to unload a specified list of the bot extensions.
Warning: use with caution when extensions have critical failures and make sure that the owner of the bot can fix eventual problems.
reload_extensions_brief: Reload a set of extensions, bot owner only
reload_extensions_description:
The bot owner can use this command to reload a specified list of the bot extensions.
Warning: use with caution and make sure that the owner of the bot can fix eventual problems.
